meanings.definition: The main town or city in a county where government offices are located.
meanings.sent1: The shiretowns in our county have all the important government buildings.
meanings.sent2: People from all over the county visit the shiretowns for official business.
meanings.sent3: I heard a funny story about the shiretowns running out of paper for the government offices!
meanings.sent4: The shiretowns stand tall like guardians of the county, watching over all its affairs.
meanings.sent5: The image of the shiretowns bustling with activity is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A town or city that serves as the administrative center of a county.
meanings.sent1: The shiretowns play a crucial role in managing county affairs.
meanings.sent2: Residents often gather in the shiretowns for important meetings.
meanings.sent3: I can't help but imagine the shiretowns throwing a party for all the county officials!
meanings.sent4: The shiretowns are like the heart of the county, pumping life into every corner.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the shiretowns bustling with activity is a sight to behold.
